title: Buying all runes for Full Refund?!?!

embed.description: This preseason, we're combining runes and masteries into a single, streamlined system that you can use to adapt and customize your playstyle in champ select. We're removing the level 30 cap, and the new cap is... infinity! We're also replacing the IP grind with a revamped rewards system that levels up with you.

body: Should I buy all runes now since I will get full refund?

replies.body: Up to you really! The [**Preseason FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115012640908-Preseason-Update-FAQ) mentions that any runes you buy after the beginning of the 2017 season will get a full IP refund, so if you really want to mess around with them here's your chance!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=FYWj1vEl,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-06T21:26:21.598+0000)
>
> Up to you really! The [**Preseason FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115012640908-Preseason-Update-FAQ) mentions that any runes you buy after the beginning of the 2017 season will get a full IP refund, so if you really want to mess around with them here's your chance!

Ummm, it was previously stated the cut-off date for ANY refund was August 31st - when the price was dropped. Any amount of IP you spent on runes since their price was reduced won't be refunded.

The information might have changed a few times, but I pulled this from that Preseason FAQ just now.
